# Changelog
 
+## 0.0.1-alpha.18
+
+### Bug fixes
+
+- fix goto-definition on imports ([#19834](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19834))
+- support recursive type aliases ([#19805](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19805))
+
+### Server
+
+- Add `ty.experimental.rename` server setting ([#19800](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19800))
+- Add `ty.inlayHints.variableTypes` server option ([#19780](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19780))
+- Add inlay hints for call arguments ([#19269](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19269))
+- Implement stdlib stub mapping ([#19529](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19529))

 # Changelog
 
+## 0.0.1-alpha.18
+
+### Bug fixes
+
+- fix goto-definition on imports ([#19834](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19834))
+- support recursive type aliases ([#19805](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19805))
+
+### Server
+
+- Add `ty.experimental.rename` server setting ([#19800](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19800))
+- Add `ty.inlayHints.variableTypes` server option ([#19780](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19780))
+- Add inlay hints for call arguments ([#19269](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19269))
+- Implement stdlib stub mapping ([#19529](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19529))
discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
- Enable go-to-definition to jump to the runtime definition in the standard library for stdlib symbols (rather than the type definition in typeshed's stubs) ([#19529](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19529))
```

commented_code:
# Changelog
 
+## 0.0.1-alpha.16
+
+### Bug fixes
+
+- Fix server panics when encountering invalid syntax in `Callable` annotations ([#19517](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19517))
+- Fix narrowing and reachability of class patterns with arguments ([#19512](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19512))
+- Fix panic for illegal `Literal[…]` annotations with inner subscript expressions ([#19489](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19489))
+- Pass down specialization to generic dataclass bases ([#19472](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19472))
+
+### Server
+
+- Add support for "go to definition" for attribute accesses and keyword arguments ([#19417](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19417))
+- Add support for "go to definition" for import statements ([#19428](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19428))
+- Add support for "document highlights" language server feature ([#19515](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19515))
+- Add partial support for "find references" language server feature ([#19475](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19475))

since this section is title `### Server`:

```suggestion
- Add support for "document highlights" ([#19515](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19515))
- Add partial support for "find references" ([#19475](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19475))
```

# Changelog
 
+## 0.0.1-alpha.16
+
+### Bug fixes
+
+- Fix server panics when encountering invalid syntax in `Callable` annotations ([#19517](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19517))
+- Fix narrowing and reachability of class patterns with arguments ([#19512](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19512))
+- Fix panic for illegal `Literal[…]` annotations with inner subscript expressions ([#19489](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19489))
+- Pass down specialization to generic dataclass bases ([#19472](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19472))

discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
- Prefer the runtime definition, not the stub definition, on a go-to-definition request for a class or function. Currently this is only implemented for definitions originating outside of the stdlib. ([#19471](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19471))
```

commented_code:
# Changelog
 
+## 0.0.1-alpha.16
+
+### Bug fixes
+
+- Fix server panics when encountering invalid syntax in `Callable` annotations ([#19517](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19517))
+- Fix narrowing and reachability of class patterns with arguments ([#19512](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19512))
+- Fix panic for illegal `Literal[…]` annotations with inner subscript expressions ([#19489](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19489))
+- Pass down specialization to generic dataclass bases ([#19472](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19472))
+
+### Server
+
+- Add support for "go to definition" for attribute accesses and keyword arguments ([#19417](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19417))
+- Add support for "go to definition" for import statements ([#19428](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19428))
+- Add support for "document highlights" language server feature ([#19515](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19515))
+- Add partial support for "find references" language server feature ([#19475](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19475))
+- Implement non-stdlib stub mapping for classes and functions ([#19471](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19471))
+- Add semantic token support for more identifiers ([#19473](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff/pull/19473))
